author: Melissa Quinn
title: Chicago mayor says coronavirus is "devastating" African-American community
description: "This virus attacks those underlying conditions with a vengeance," Lightfoot said on "Face the Nation."
content:
Washington — Chicago Mayor Lori Lightfoot said Sunday that the coronavirus is "devastating" black communities in part because of the underlying health conditions that disportionately impact people of color.
